UTF-8 Text File Sample
======================

This file contains various UTF-8 encoded characters to test file handling capabilities.

Special Characters:
- Currency: €, £, ¥, ₹
- Accented: á, é, í, ó, ú, ñ, ç, ü, ö
- Greek: α, β, γ, δ, ε, θ, λ, π, σ, ω
- Math: ∑, ∏, √, ∞, ≈, ≠, ≤, ≥, ∈, ∉

Asian Languages:
- Japanese: こんにちは世界 (Hello World)
- Chinese: 你好世界 (Hello World)
- Korean: 안녕하세요 세계 (Hello World)

Emoji Support:
🌍 🌎 🌏 🚀 💻 📁 📝 ✅ ❌ ⚡

End of UTF-8 test file.
